Content.summary: 'Cafe East - Four chilli rated' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about Hanoi, London, Hong Van written on 09 May 2007
Content.bodyText:
Visited: 07/04/2007

Four chilli rated

24, Evelyn St, Deptford, London, SE8 5DG.

Andy at Little Hanoi recommended this one to us and it didn't dissapoint.

Similar to Hong Van with a wonderfully spicy and herby stock. No chilli sauce required.

Packed full of Vietnamese diners, I have been back since and people are waiting on the pavement to get in.

No complaints whatsoever. A real top notch bowl.

Good for: Wonderful bowl of Bun bo Hue.
Bad for: A bit off the beaten track
